hardcover.config.tooltip.alternative_rec: Adds one extra row of recipe results by rearranging the search field and navigation buttons.
Displays the resulting item instead of the recipe, and a tooltip shows the material list.
hardcover.config.tooltip.bounce: Toggles the subtle bounce effect seen when new recipes are added.
hardcover.config.tooltip.centered_invent: Centers the inventory and prevents it from moving when the recipe book is opened.
hardcover.config.tooltip.circular_scroll: Enables circular scrolling when using the next and previous buttons.
hardcover.config.tooltip.dark_mode: VanillaTweaks-based dark mode for the tweaked texture of the alternative recipe button.
hardcover.config.tooltip.invert_scroll_d: Inverts the scroll direction when using the mouse wheel.
hardcover.config.tooltip.mouse_wheel_scr: Enables mouse wheel scrolling within the recipe book.
hardcover.config.tooltip.quick_craft: Quickly craft items by clicking on recipes while pressing the 'Quick Craft' keybinding.
hardcover.config.tooltip.recipe_book: Toggles the recipe book button in supported screens.
hardcover.config.tooltip.ungroup_recipes: Ungroup any grouped recipes into single recipes.
hardcover.config.tooltip.unlock_all_reci: Unlock all recipes when a player enters a single player world.
